name: TVCollectionViewFullScreenLayout
desc: A collection view layout that organizes items into a browsable, full-screen display format.

items.name: var interitemSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The spacing between each cell in a collection view.

items.name: var centerIndexPath: IndexPath?
items.desc: The index path of the currently centered item.

items.name: var maskAmount: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount by which to mask the cells in a collection view.

items.name: var maskInset: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The edge insets of the cell mask.

items.name: var cornerRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius to use when drawing rounded corners for the cell.

items.name: var parallaxFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: A value that specifies how slowly the background should move relative to the foreground.

items.name: var isTransitioningToCenterIndexPath: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is changing index paths.
